    • Method Detail

      • setSquare

        public void setSquare(int x,
                      int y,
                      java.lang.String c)
        Parameters:
        x - Indicates x coordinate desired when setting piece on board
        y - Indicates y coordinate desired when setting piece on board
        c - Indicates what color the piece should be when placed on board

      • atPosition

        public java.lang.String atPosition(int x,
                                   int y)
        Parameters:
        x - Indicates x coordinate to be read from boardLayout[][]
        y - Indicates y coordinate to be read from boardLayout[][]
        Returns:
        Returns result of piece that is on the specified coordinates

      • wipeBoard

        public void wipeBoard()
        wipeBoard() erases the whole boardLayout[][] by writing blank characters to all coordinates using nested for loops

      • drawBoard

        public void drawBoard()
        drawBoard() method is called during each turn to draw an updated version of the current board
